message:
Hey <@&1424461167883194418>,

## Weekly Update - 2026-02-21

48 PRs merged this week. The hive has been busy renovating the foundations and planting new seeds. Here is what happened:

**ðŸŽ¨ App Showcase & Community**
- **Showcase Renovation:** The App Showcase now supports proper Markdown descriptions, better metrics, and a cleaner UI. Your apps look better than ever.
- **Badge System:** Introduced a proper badge system. BYOP is officially rebranded to **Pollen**.
- **Build Diary:** Added an interactive diary to the Community page so you can visualize the history of what we are building.

**ðŸ¤– Polly & Infrastructure**
- **OpenAI Compatibility:** Added `polly-api`, an OpenAI-compatible interface for Polly. Drop it into your existing workflows.
- **Auto Polly:** Deployed a self-healing repo agent. It fixes itself so we don't have to.
- **NPM Update:** Moved packages to the `@pollinations_ai` scope. Please update your imports.

**âœ¨ Models & New Apps**
- **Safety:** Added Qwen3Guard 8B.
- **New Apps:** A massive harvest including **SlidePainter**, **Nova Defense**, and **BrainrotMaker** (we don't judge, we just host).

Infrastructure is open, code is fresh. Go build something weird.
